subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Tony Parker had 15 points and 18 assists for San Antonio, which lost a 13-point lead in regulation but prevailed to put Memphis in a 2-0 series hole.
snippet: Tony Parker had 15 points and 18 assists for San Antonio, which lost a 13-point lead in regulation but prevailed to put Memphis in a 2-0 series hole.
